attributes.action: ensure that MPs who have abused the expenses system resign now,
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: ensure that MPs who have abused the expenses system resign now, rather than be permitted to stay on until a General Election in order to collect severance pay and pensions.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
